Introduction: You look unfamiliar.#$b#Hi, I'm Shelby. Pleased to meet you.#$e#Some say this valley is magical. You'll just have to see for yourself.
GreenRain: I feel like I should be afraid of this rain...#$b#For some reason I'm not.
GreenRainFinished: The mysterious green rain has ended.#$b#Maybe it's just me, but the valley seems happier now.$h
GreenRain_2: The green rain again! I welcome it this year.$h
summerArchaeologyHouse_22_4: This week we're discussing Inuyasha.#$b#I'm so glad to be sharing this book with the club! It's one of my favorites.$h#$b#Kagome is obviously the best character.
fallArchaeologyHouse_22_4: I'm really enjoying this book.#$b#Sometimes it's nice to read something light. Not every book has to be 400 dense pages.
winterArchaeologyHouse_22_4: This week we're discussing Zech's book, "The Lords of 10ckn3g0r."#$b#I love the setting so far. The changing perspectives also keeps it interesting.
ArchaeologyHouse_22_4: I love a good murder mystery. I'm pretty sure I have this whole book figured out already.
summerBeach_70_19: Fancy meeting you here, @.#$b#Did you bring any wine?$h
spring_Mon: I saw a baby deer in the forest with its mother.#$b#It was so cute!$h#$e#Nature is amazing.
spring_Tue: This is perfect weather to go on a run.
spring_Wed: I think I need to renew my library card soon.
spring_Thu: I baked some cookies last night and they turned out perfect!#$b#Because I'm a perfect being who can do no wrong.#$e#That was sarcasm.#$e#Those cookies tasted like eggplant.#$e#I probably should have added less eggplant.
spring_Sat: Zech is the best, isn't he?#$e#He's just so... dependable.#$b#Like a ballet bar that's there for me to catch my balance.#$e#We all need someone like that in our lives.
spring_Sun: I love the forest.#$e#Maybe that's where I'll retire.#$e#Assuming I ever save up enough to retire!$s
summer_Mon: Hi, @!#$b#Make sure you're taking care of yourself. Drink plenty of water.#$b#And try to get to bed before 2am tonight!
summer_Tue: I love zucchini, but I can never seem to find them here in the valley.#$e#Ah, well.
summer_Wed: I'd love to go to a Renaissance faire.
summer_Thu: I'm interested in what crops you're growing on your farm.#$b#Of course, I also wouldn't mind if you let me sample some of them.
summer_Fri: The forest calls to me.#$b#I want to run and be free.
summer_Sat: I like crusty bread.#$e#Give me a tough baguette over something soft any day of the week.#$e#My teeth yearn for a challenge.
fall_Mon: This weather makes me want to watch Over the Garden Wall.
fall_Tue: I love how many crows and ravens we get this time of year!$h
fall_Wed: Mushrooms are nature's bouillon.#$b#They go great in stews.
fall_Thu: This town could do with a good murder mystery.
fall_Fri: I'm actually a spirit of the forest.#$b#Just kidding!$h#$b#Unless...
fall_Sat: Is that a maple seed in your hair?#$b#Here, let me get that for you.[310]
fall_Sun: Hey there, @!#$b#Would you like to stop by for some tea later?
winter_Mon: I'm making macaroni tonight!#$e#I'm excited. I'm making it from scratch.
winter_Tue: This year I tried to make pickled plums...#$b#You know, preserving things at home.#$b#But unfortunately I wound up with plum jam.$s
winter_Wed: I had to learn the Krebs cycle in school.#$b#I still have nightmares about those exams.
winter_Thu: The crocuses are so pretty this time of year.#$e#Croci?$s#$e#Crocuses.
winter_Fri: We need to destigmatize going to therapy.#$e#Hello, @.#$e#I hope you're going well.
winter_Sat: Oh, hello @.#$e#It's nice to see you.
winter_Sun: This is such a cozy time of year.#$e#I've been spending a lot of time indoors.#$e#I'm craving sunlight.
